scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently 'postcss src/tailwind.css -o dist/main.css --watch' 'live-server' 'npm run chokidar'
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production postcss src/tailwind.css -o dist/main.min.css && npm run elm-build
scripts.setup-git-hook:
hook=.git/hooks/pre-commit; if [ -f $hook.sample ]; then (mv $hook.sample $hook; echo 'done <renam></renam>ing'); else echo "no changes needed "; fi; chmod +x $hook && printf '#!/bin/sh
set -e
elm-format src/ --yes
elm-test' > .git/hooks/pre-commit
